9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah said:"We said: 'O Messenger of Allah! Shall we build a structure to shade you at Mina? He said: 'No., Mina is a resting place for whoever arrives

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ مِنًى مُنَاخُ مَنْ سَبَقَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: Mina Is A Resting Place For Whoever Arrives
